update.name: Sagenda Calendar
update.description:
This is the lastest version of Sagenda booking calendar. = 1.4.0 = * ADDED : First support for customization edition form.
= 1.3.1 = * FIXED : An error message if PayPal module not activated even if there's not paid event.
= 1.3.0 = * ADDED : Event title (when checked "display in frontend") can be now displayed also in the calendar view. Was only in list view until today. * ADDED : Coupon code. If your customers book a paid event, they can now enter coupon code (aka : discount code). * IMPROVED : if there's a paid event and the payment module isn't activated we display an error message. * IMPROVED : registration form layout is better (again).
